channel.title: Miscellaneous information on DNM Bible
channel.description: Recent content in Miscellaneous information on DNM Bible

item.title: Javascript
item.description: Javascript warnings If you have javascript on you have probably gotten a warning on a few different sites by now. Javascript is not naturally dangerous, but it can be used in different situations to deanonymize who you are. Again this is why we say keep your darknet activities, and clearnet completely separate. Certain websites can use javascript to see what your real IP address is behind tor. Disabling javascript Note: You will need to do this everytime you restart tails!
